Game.Controller

Class StartupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Controller.StartupController

  • public class StartupController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller for the startup phase that takes place between game settings and game play.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    ndkcha, Jay

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StartupController(java.io.File mapFile)
      A constructor that initializes the default values.

      Assign armies to the initially conquered countries of the players.

      Assign countries to the players.
      int determineOfInitialArmy(int noOfPlayers)
      Based on number of players, this method determines the number of armies allowed for the initial game play

    • Constructor Detail

      • StartupController

        public StartupController(java.io.File mapFile)
        A constructor that initializes the default values.
        Parameters:
        mapFile - File descriptor of the map file.

    • Method Detail

      • processFiles

        public void processFiles()
        Process the map file and load the data inside the DataHolder object.

      • assignCountries

        public void assignCountries()
        Assign countries to the players. It shuffles the list countries in order to give a random assignment to the players. It assigns the countries to the players in round robin fashion.

      • assignArmies

        public void assignArmies()
        Assign armies to the initially conquered countries of the players. Based on number of players in the game, a specific number of armies are assigned to random countries that the players owns.

      • determineOfInitialArmy

        public int determineOfInitialArmy(int noOfPlayers)
        Based on number of players, this method determines the number of armies allowed for the initial game play
        Parameters:
        noOfPlayers - Number of players in the game play
        Returns:
        number of armies allowed.
